name: instance-group-ips
author: Google Cloud Tools
description: Get the external IPs for all virtual machines in an instance group.
helpMarkDown: Use these external IPs as targets for the [IIS Web App Deploy task](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/build-release/tasks/deploy/iis-deploy).

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: GCP connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Google Cloud Platform connection to use.

inputs.name: locationScope
inputs.label: Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select either a zone or region instance group.

inputs.name: zone
inputs.label: Zone
inputs.helpMarkDown: The zone of the instance group.

inputs.name: region
inputs.label: Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The region of the instance group.

inputs.name: instanceGroupName
inputs.label: Instance Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the instance group.

inputs.name: buildVariableName
inputs.label: Build Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The external ips of the VMs in the instance group will be stored in a build variable with this name.

inputs.name: separator
inputs.label: Separator
inputs.helpMarkDown: The string placed between each ip in the build variable. Defaults to ',' if left empty.
